Text: Cost Saving ProposalDear Richard At the outset let me introduce myself My name is Prameesh Barlota and I represent Atos Origin Atos Origin a leading global information technology services provider helps clients turn their vision into results through the effective use of Ebusiness solutions and IT With sales of more than billion in Atos Origin currently operates in more than countries worldwide and has more then employees Its customers include ABNAmro AkzoNobel Aramco BNP Paribas Cegetel Vivendi Credit Lyonnais Euronext Fiat ICI Lucent Technologies Philip Morris Philips Unilever and Wolters Flower For more information visit the companys website at Having worked with many global customers we are aware of the business issues faced by an organization like Enron Corp from the software development and maintenance and product support point of view We at Atos Origin are structured as Competence Centers around products like SAP Baan JD Edwards QAD Siebel Oracle I which provides Implementation services as well as support services We have global delivery model which combines local resources along with resources in cost effective economies around the world like India China Hungry etc We have centres in CA Dallax Cincinnati in North America and Toronto in Canada The man power in these centres are more than Software Professionals India based Global Software Engineering facility provides full range of IT services encompassing entire lifecycle This mechanism called Software Factory allows us to build a full service delivery compatible with your technical functional and cultural needs The mechanism of the Software Factory can offer the following benefits to Enron Corp Free up critical internal resources for strategic projects Visible predictable and controlled life cycle costs and risk management Guaranteed quality efficiency and standardization of the development process ISO CMM Level Preagreed deliverables and service levels measured performance using balanced scorecard Creative business models and contracts covering various risks and performance sharing based service level agreements Minimize fixed costs investment Reduce development and lifecycle costs We expect to offer at least cost savings over using local US resources by using our Global Software Engineering Factory I can provide you concrete data regarding the benefits that our customers have got by working with our Software Factory Atos Origin would be able to set up a custombuilt service delivery mechanism to extend your own software capabilities right from maintenance and support of legacy applications to development of new web applications I would be glad to visit your offices to meet you to present discuss this value proposition further Please do let me know suitable date for appointment Kind regards Prameesh Barlota Marketing Manager Atos Origin Tel Fax Mobile
